17. Give a typical day's menu (breakfast, dinner & supper) for the earliest year you can remember. Give the year and list the members of the family with their ages at the time. State the approximate month, e.g., winter or summer.

Need new potatoes, onions, for breakfast. Try to use the same for 3 meals, not much dessert. Try to have a pie not much cake. No variety except everyday week in weekend.

18. That year did you serve your first Christmas dinner in eastern Canada? If so, give details. If not, give reasons why not.

For breakfast - oat flakes, porridge.

Knead, bake, make cake.

19. Were you ever reduced to almost starvation level? Living on one or two dry years only? Give details.

Try dry years only, 89-90-92-45 monthly and varied when.
